english.segment1: It's hard to understand. When you don't know me. But we can still be friends. It's better of that way
english.segment2: Through my eyes I'll see you there. I'll never be the same again. With my words I'll make a change. And I'll never be the same again
english.segment3: It's hard to make amends. I know it isn't easy. But try and understand. It's really not that bad
english.segment4: Through my eyes I'll see you there. I'm hard to understand when no one ever seems to care. And with my words I'll make a change. And try to rearrange
english.segment5: Walls of fear come crashing down. I won't look back don't turn around. And with my life I'll make a change. Hope we'll all be friends again.
